# Conclusion

In this notebook, we analyzed a dataset containing 50 rivers vs plastic shares information. Most of them belonging to the continent of Asia. We can conclude easily that only these 50 rivers contibute to approximately **26.99%** of plastic deposition in the Oceans of our planets. 

More than 1000 rivers account for 80% of global riverine plastic emmissions into the oceans.[Source](https://advances.sciencemag.org/content/7/18/eaaz5803)

This data may be old. But still this gives us an idea about the water pollution we humans cause. We all know that things are getting out of control.
